alert.note: Alert for Choctaw; Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 8:16PM CDT until April 13 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Choctaw County in central Mississippi... Winston County in east central Mississippi... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 816 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Ackerman to near Stallo, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Severe thunderstorms will be near... Millcreek and Betheden around 835 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Noxapater and Weir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central, northeastern and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
